reasoning: IBS is a chronic functional disorder with prevalence-based epidemiology. Global prevalence estimated at approximately 11% (11,000 per 100k) based on meta-analyses and systematic reviews of community surveys. Incidence not reported due to unclear disease onset and chronic fluctuating course.
source: Lacy BE et al. (2021). Bowel disorders. Gastroenterology. 150:1393-1407
